Room.Name: Vickers Estate Front Door
Room.ShortDescription: The Vickers Estate is the oldest house in the village of Brownhaven.
Room.LongDescription: The Vickers family established their home here soon after the village was founded. No one lives here now, but someday the residence may be reclaimed by the sons of old man Vickers. The story is that they were taken from Brownhaven after their father was murdered.
